item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Trump signs peace agreement, last living hostages released
item.description: President Donald Trump addressed the Knesset, the Israeli parliament, on Monday before traveling to Egypt for a peace summit.

item.title: LendingTree CEO and founder Doug Lebda dies in ATV accident
item.description: LendingTree CEO and founder Doug Lebda died in an ATV accident on Sunday, the company confirmed

item.title: Trump, world leaders gather in Egypt for ceasefire deal signing with Netanyahu absent
item.description: After speaking in Israel, Trump traveled to Egypt for an international "peace summit" with more than 20 world leaders on what's next for Gaza.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump participates in signing ceremony at peace summit
item.description: President Trump participated in a signing ceremony at the peace summit in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, marking the first phase of the ceasefire agreement b...

item.title: WATCH: Crowd gathers in Tel Aviv as last of the 20 living hostages released by Hamas
item.description: The last of the 20 remaining living hostages taken by Hamas on Oct. 7, 2023, were returned to Israel on Monday as part of an exchange for Palestinian ...
